item.title: An Inside Look at Locarno’s British Postwar Cinema Retrospective, Including a Former Festival Winner
item.description: Curator Ehsan Khoshbakht explains his selection, the roles of ruins and children in 1945-1960 films, and how “popular cinema was systematically attacked and destroyed by British film critics” back in
